snippet: The Agriculture Department has developed a new government certification and labeling for foods that are free of genetically modified ingredients.
abstract: Agriculture Department develops new certification and labeling for foods that are free of genetically modified organisms; certification is first of its kind, and will allow companies to voluntarily carry claims that their products are free of GMOs.
lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department has developed a new government certification and labeling for foods that are free of genetically modified ingredients.

headline.main: U.S.D.A. Develops Label to Verify G.M.O.-FREE. Food
headline.print_headline: U.S.D.A. Develops Label to Verify G.M.O.-Free Food
